headline: Does Comcast’s Stock Slide Signal a Value Opportunity After Recent Industry Mergers?
summary: Thinking of buying Comcast and wondering if now is the time for real value, or if the market’s just playing tricks? Let’s dig in together and see what the numbers actually say. Comcast’s stock price has been on something of a rollercoaster lately, with a 0.4% bump over the last week, but still down 27.3% year-to-date and 34.3% over the past year. Much of this downside has come as the media and telecom industries have faced headwinds from shifting consumer habits, streaming wars, and...
